**Performed by ocg release manager**

- [ ] Prepare stable release vY.Y.Y
- [ ] Tag and release stable  vY.Y.Y
- [ ] Prepare beta  release vX.X.X
- [ ] Tag and release beta  vX.X.X
- [ ] Prepare ocg-releases vX.X.X
- [ ] Release binaries vX.X.X
